member.name: TYPEATTR.guid
member.summary: The GUID of the type information.

member.name: TYPEATTR.lcid
member.summary: The locale of member names and documentation strings.

member.name: TYPEATTR.memidConstructor
member.summary: The constructor ID, or MEMBERID_NIL if none.

member.name: TYPEATTR.memidDestructor
member.summary: The destructor ID, or MEMBERID_NIL if none.

member.name: TYPEATTR.cbSizeInstance
member.summary: The size of an instance of this type.

member.name: TYPEATTR.cVars
member.summary: The number of variables or data members.

member.name: TYPEATTR.cbSizeVft
member.summary: The size of this type's VTBL.

member.name: TYPEATTR.cbAlignment
member.summary: The byte alignment for an instance of this type. A value of 0 indicates alignment on the 64K boundary; 1 indicates no special alignment. For other values, n indicates aligned on byte n.

member.name: TYPEATTR.tdescAlias
member.summary: If typekind is TKIND_ALIAS, specifies the type for which this type is an alias.

member.name: TYPEATTR.idldescType
member.summary: The IDL attributes of the described type.
